enhanced_description: Infor is a global leader in business cloud software, providing complete industry-specific suites designed to drive digital transformation and overcome market disruptions. Leveraging data science and prioritizing user experience, Infor's technology seamlessly integrates into existing systems. With over 65,000 organizations worldwide relying on its solutions, Infor aims to make end users' jobs easier and help them operate more efficiently. The company offers flexible deployment models, supporting end-to-end system operations or providing specific functional support, backed by an award-winning support team. Its comprehensive offerings span Human Capital Management (including HR, payroll, talent, and scheduling), Finance and Accounting, and Supply Chain operations, catering primarily to large and global enterprises.
